about.sectionTitle: About the Northamptonshire Community E-Voucher Scheme

mission.title: Mission Statement
mission.text: To create inclusive, resilient, and empowered communities by addressing the root causes of hardship and inequality through partnership, compassion, and community-driven innovation.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.text: A fairer, healthier, and more connected society where everyone has the opportunity to reach their full potential.

values.title: Our Values
values.compassionDesc: We care deeply about people and their stories.
values.equityDesc: We champion fairness and inclusion for all.
values.empowermentDesc: We invest in people to become agents of change.
values.collaborationDesc: We build partnerships that strengthen collective impact.
values.integrityDesc: We are accountable, transparent, and community-centred in all we do.

bakup.title: About BAK UP CIC
bakup.paragraph1: BAK UP CIC is proud to lead the Northamptonshire Community E-Voucher Scheme, an innovative, community-led solution that ensures families and individuals facing hardship can access culturally appropriate essential goods and services with dignity, flexibility, and fairness.
bakup.paragraph2: Our E-Voucher model replaces traditional food parcels with digital, text-based, and paper-based vouchers that can be redeemed at local participating shops, markets, and community suppliers. This approach not only supports households in crisis but also reinvests spending back into the local economy, strengthening small businesses and community networks.

keyAreas.title: Key Work Areas
keyAreas.foodSecurityDesc: Mobile food services, E-Voucher schemes, white goods provision, and partnerships with local retailers to ensure families can access culturally appropriate and nutritious food.
keyAreas.youthEmpowermentDesc: Through the East Northamptonshire Youth Ambassadors (EYA) and other leadership programmes, we equip young people with the confidence, skills, and voice to become positive changemakers in their communities.
keyAreas.healthWellbeingDesc: Community-based interventions tackling health inequalities, loneliness, and social isolation, while promoting physical activity, mental health awareness, and trusted-adult relationships.
keyAreas.socialDeterminantsDesc: A holistic focus on improving access to education, employment, and healthcare, empowering people to thrive rather than survive.
keyAreas.communityCohesionDesc: Celebrating diversity through initiatives such as the Windrush Generation Celebration, storytelling projects, and intergenerational community events that honour identity and belonging.

circular.title: Creating a Circular and Sustainable Community Economy
circular.paragraph1: The E-Voucher Scheme also creates a unique opportunity for local shops and retailers to play an active role in reducing waste and promoting sustainability.
circular.paragraph2: Participating outlets will be able to notify BAK UP CIC and partner charities about surplus food and essential goods, enabling these items to be collected and redistributed to families in need rather than going to waste. This simple yet powerful system strengthens the local circular economy ‚Äì ensuring that valuable resources are used efficiently, environmental impact is reduced, and communities become more resilient, sustainable, and self-supporting.

funders.title: Why Funders Should Invest
funders.text: Funding the E-Voucher Scheme means investing in a smarter, fairer, and greener approach to tackling poverty and inequality. Every pound directly benefits both households facing hardship and local small businesses, creating a positive cycle of community wealth and wellbeing.

footerAbout.title: About Us
footerAbout.description: BAK UP CIC leads the Northamptonshire Community E-Voucher Scheme, providing dignified support to families and strengthening local economies.

footerFunders.title: For Funders
footerFunders.description: Invest in a smarter, fairer approach to tackling poverty and inequality.

footerContact.title: Contact Us
footerContact.location: Enterprise Centre, Warth Park, Raunds NN9 6GR

about.copyright: ¬© 2024 BAK UP CIC. All rights reserved. | Northamptonshire Community E-Voucher Scheme

vendor.welcomeTitle: Welcome to the Northamptonshire Community E-Voucher Scheme
vendor.welcomeThank: Thank you for joining BAK UP CIC as a participating shop or vendor! You are a vital partner in our community-led approach to supporting families facing hardship.
vendor.welcomeDignity: By accepting e-vouchers, you provide families with dignity, choice, and access to culturally appropriate food and essentials. At the same time, you benefit from increased footfall and support for your local business.
vendor.welcomeCircular: You can also help reduce waste by notifying us about surplus food and goods for redistribution, strengthening our circular economy.
vendor.instruction1: Scan the QR code or enter the voucher code manually
vendor.instruction2: Enter the code in the field below or use the scan button
vendor.instruction3: Click 'Validate' to check the voucher is valid and see the balance
vendor.instruction4: Enter the amount to redeem (must not exceed voucher balance)
vendor.instruction5: Always validate the voucher before accepting it as payment
vendor.instruction6: The recipient's voucher balance will be updated automatically

vcseWelcome.title: Welcome to the Northamptonshire Community E-Voucher Scheme
vcseWelcome.paragraph1: Thank you for partnering with BAK UP CIC to support families and individuals facing hardship across Northamptonshire. As a VCFSE organization, you are at the heart of our community-led approach to tackling food insecurity.
vcseWelcome.paragraph2: Our E-Voucher system replaces traditional food parcels with flexible, dignified support that respects cultural preferences and gives families real choice. Every voucher you issue helps strengthen local economies by supporting participating shops and retailers.
vcseWelcome.paragraph3: Together, we're building a more inclusive, sustainable, and resilient community where everyone can thrive.
